description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the root React component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports necessary dependencies including React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering components into a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the specified DOM node using the created React root.
